para: 《相约古罗马》是一部欧美电视剧，于2012年播出，主演是Marry Beard，对白语言是英语。海报名称：相约古罗马主演：Mary Beard类型：欧美电视剧产地：欧美语言：英语年份：2012年Meet the Romans Professor Mary Beard looks beyond the stories of emperors, armies, guts and gore to meet the everyday people at the heart of Ancient Rome’s vast empire We still live in the shadow of ancient Rome - a city at the heart of a vast empire that stretched from Scotland to Afghanistan, dominating the West for over 700 years Professor Mary Beard puts aside the stories of emperors and armies, guts and gore, to meet the real Romans living at the heart of it all
